message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.HC 

The paper presents a method for action recognition using a CNN architecture and multiple sensor modalities. This falls under computer vision (cs.CV) as well as machine learning (cs.LG) since the method involves classification using a CNN. The use of multiple sensor modalities also suggests the possibility of multimodal learning (cs.MM) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) techniques. Additionally, the paper mentions experiments on signal reduction to prevent overloading, which could be relevant to human-computer interaction (cs.HC).
